title: Forever Fair: The Beauty of a Face Will Perish, But a Warrior Born Will Never Die.
description: Azelia Pendragon was the most beautiful woman in the kingdom when her infuriating jealousy took over her sanity. After making a deal with a sly wizard, she loses her life to her daughter, Vidella Altaire. Vidella has spent her life in the dark about her past, but it all begins to unravel on her eighteenth birthday when the sinister spirit of her mother appears before her eyes. Now Vidella must figure out a way to kill the already dead Azelia on a journey filled with fear, pain, and self-discovery. “Forever Fair” is a retelling of the classic tale “Snow White.”
author: Elise Pehrson
